name: CHERNOBALL
description:
In the grim and awesome future, giant mechs hurl balls of unstable radioactive material at each other. 

This is Football at its finest.

This is sport at its Most Extreme

This Is CHERNOBALL

Each team races to destroy the enemy's goal by filling it with so much unstable material that it explodes. But beware! Carry too much material and you run the risk of Meltdown!

2 - 4 Player Local Multiplayer
